dct_title_s: Net-Zero America carbon dioxide storage basins for net-zero scenarios, 2050
dct_description_sm: This dataset displays the carbon dioxide (CO2) storage basins in the contiguous United States considered viable in 2050 for all net-zero-emissions scenarios.
dct_creator_sm: Claire Wayner, Civil and Environmental Engineering Department, Princeton University, Undergraduate, Class of 2022
Andrew Pascale, Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
